headline: United Rentals Outlines Innovative Solutions to Maximize Performance on the Worksite
summary: STAMFORD, Conn., February 25, 2025--United Rentals, Inc. (NYSE: URI), the world’s largest equipment rental company, today outlined steps construction, industrial and manufacturing companies can take to improve worksite performance by connecting people and equipment through data. The approach provides innovative, yet practical, ways companies can link nearly every part of a worksite - from the perimeter gate to the back office - to increase safety, productivity and sustainability.
